name: Spakitty
tagline: He was lost in the sauce.
entry:
The cat slurps and squelches as it rubs up against you.

"Cheese moulds, and it's sold at higher prices, why not me? Why not me?"

"Were you rescued?"

"It's all a matter of persgetti."

name: Sink Sphynx
tagline: A riddle pruney from the water.
entry:
As you scoop it into the carrier, the wrinkly, fleshy mass pops and bubbles.

"She shrieks, she squeals, gone white, she peels."

"Descend, then end, the egg and its hen."

name: Kibbles
entry:
"Crumbs, crumbs, crumbs!"

"Hello, little one," you scratch at the portly kitten's chin.

"Yummy, full tummy! It's nutritious deliciousness, courtesy of mummy!"

name: Pure Bread
tagline: Oh beauty, I take your breath away!
entry:
A small mass of wheezing fluff, the cat struggles to seek you out through shrouded eyes.

"Come closer."

You lean in. You hear a single whisper on fish-scented breath, "We ran out of kibble long ago."

name: Kittea
entry:
The tiny kitten floats lazily in the well-aged tea, the stale smell of catnip wafting from the mug.

"I thought cats hated water."

"Maybe some fear returning to their true form."

name: Drain Clog
entry:
You hesitate slightly before scooping at the damp tangle of fur, hair and shower sludge.

Two small eyes bubble to the surface as the tiny creature's legs stretch outwards, and it kneads at your palm.

name: Floofa
entry:
The spongy orb vibrates angrily as you lift it from the shower head.

"Who awakens us?!" it squeals.

You feel a sharp pain as you stuff the orb awayâ€”two pinpricks of bloody red glare at you from the palm of your hand.

name: Splootpaste
entry:
"9 out of 10 cats recommend brushing your teeth."

"And if I choose not to?"

"Either way, teeth are easily digestible."

"What do you mean by that?"

The cat stretches and settles back into her tube.

name: Alcatraz
entry:
An explosion of black fur stares at you from the wall cavity.

"Rats! The fuzz! Just walk away mate."

"I'm sorry, kid, but you're comin' with me."

"You 'ain't got tangible evidence! You can't prove nothin'!"

name: Meowel
entry:
The flat cat's arms remain splayed above his head after you unhook him.

"You don't look wet! I'm only for drying!"

"On to better things, buddy."

"You sure you can't just, like, spill a cup of water or something?"
